mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (cust_id, pwd, name, email, tel_no, sex, birth_dt, reg_dt, adult_verif_dt, cart_cnt, point, consent) VALUES (#{custId}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{email}, #{telNo}, #{sex}, #{birthDt}, now(), #{adultVerifDt}, #{cartCnt}, #{point}, #{consent})
mapper.sql: SELECT cust_id, pwd, name, email, tel_no, sex, birth_dt, reg_dt, adult_verif_dt, cart_cnt, point, consent, act_stat, grade FROM customer WHERE custId = #{custId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer WHERE cust_id = #{custId}
